rules_text:
Islandwalk [i](This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)[/i]
Whenever Pikehunter Triton deals combat damage to a player, create a Food token.
Sacrifice two Food tokens: Pikehunter Triton explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
